body:
Kestrel does use libuv, but don't see it here in the backtrace.
On Apr 3, 2015 18:35, "bosstjann" notifications@github.com wrote:

> Stacktrace:
> 
> at
> at (wrapper managed-to-native) object.wrapper_native_0x7432563c
> (Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Networking.UvLoopHandle,int)

> (Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Networking.UvLoopHandle,int)
> at Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Networking.UvLoopHandle.Run (int)
> at Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.KestrelThread.ThreadStart (object)
> at System.Threading.Thread.StartInternal ()
> at (wrapper runtime-invoke) object.runtime_invoke_void__this__
> (object,intptr,intptr,intptr)
>
